items.title: Keane's actions weren't deliberate - Moyes on red card
items.summary: Everton manager David Moyes was not happy with the decision for Michael Keane to be sent off as it was "not a deliberate action", but has no sympathy for Jack Grealish who received two quick yellow cards for dissent.

items.title: Gilmore puts out-of-form Quins on notice with squad cuts

items.title: WhatsApp adds three new features to group chats
items.summary: WhatsApp is 'leveling up' your group chats today with three new features. With Member tags, you can give yourself a tag to tell the group what your role is. This can be different for each group you're in. Next up, text stickers. Any word can now be turned into a sticker by simply typing your text iâ€¦

items.title: AMD teases heavily-rumored Ryzen 9 9950X3D2, continues to leak despite CES no-show â€” Alienware China touts the chip for its Area 51 desktop
items.summary: AMD didn't announce the Ryzen 9 9950X3D2 at CES 2026, but others have come to the rescue. Alienware China has posted a video on its BiliBili account showing the 9950X3D2 coming to its Area 51 desktop, confirming the chip exists. Moreover, a UK-based system integrator has also put up the 9950X3D2 onâ€¦

items.title: Carrick and Solskjaer frontrunners for Man Utd caretaker role
items.summary: Michael Carrick and Ole Gunnar Solskjaer emerge as frontrunners to become Manchester United's caretaker manager until the end of the season.

items.title: UKA chief 'appalled' as Prescod joins Enhanced Games
items.summary: Former Great Britain sprinter Reece Prescod joins controversial Enhanced Games as UK Athletics chief executive says he is "appalled".

items.title: Samsung’s Ballie robot is probably never coming out
items.summary: Samsung's spherical Ballie robot may be rolling off into the sunset, less than a year after its retail launch was announced. The smart home robot has made an appearance at CES almost every year since it was first announced in 2020, but was notably absent at CES 2026. Unfortunately, its disappearancâ€¦

items.title: OpenAI launches ChatGPT Health, encouraging users to connect their medical records
items.summary: OpenAI has been dropping hints this week about AI's role as a "healthcare ally" - and today, the company is announcing a product to go along with that idea: ChatGPT Health. ChatGPT Health is a sandboxed tab within ChatGPT that's designed for users to ask their health-related questions in what it deâ€¦

items.title: Amazon’s smart shopping cart for Whole Foods gets bigger, lighter, and adds tap-to-pay
items.summary: Amazon says its new Dash Cart has a 40 percent larger capacity. Amazon is launching a revamped version of its smart shopping cart, which it plans to bring to dozens of Whole Foods locations by the end of this year, according to an announcement on Wednesday. The new Dash Cart features a "more responâ€¦

items.title: Fujifilmâ€™s new instant camera captures video with vintage effects
items.summary: You hold Fujifilmâ€™s new instant camera sideways like a camcorder. | Image: Fujifilm Fujifilm is expanding its hybrid instant camera line with the new Instax Mini Evo Cinema that adds the ability to capture video clips up to 15 seconds long. The Mini Evo Cinema also features a unique design inspiredâ€¦

items.title: Some of our favorite 4K UHD Blu-rays are three for $33 at Amazon right now
items.summary: The holidays â€” and the copious amounts of binge-watching that come with them â€” are very much behind us at this point, but that doesnâ€™t mean there wonâ€™t be time to catch up on the movies from last year (and beyond) you might have missed. Thankfully, Amazon has brought back one of the better promos wâ€¦

items.title: Beijing tells companies to pause H200 purchases â€” China govt deliberating terms for letting local tech companies buy US chips while still growing homegrown semiconductors
items.summary: Beijing doesn't want tech companies stockpiling H200 chips while it's still figuring out how to balance the needs of its AI industry and its push for homegrown semiconductors.

items.title: Samsung patent shows flip phone with a 360-degree hinge
items.summary: A new Samsung patent gives us our first look at a flip-style foldable, which folds both inward and outward. The patent was spotted on the World Intellectual Property Organization (WIPO) database and is accompanied by sketches for the flip-style device with a 360-degree hinge. Unlike mainstream flipâ€¦

items.title: Nvidia's next-gen RTX 60 series might not debut until the second half of 2027, says leaker â€” rumor claims Rubin architecture will power future consumer GPUs

items.title: Neymar extends Santos deal in bid for World Cup spot
items.summary: Neymar extends his Santos deal until the end of 2026 as Brazil's all-time leading goalscorer seeks to earn a World Cup call-up.

items.title: 'It hurts, it hurts a lot' - Skivington on pain of Gloucester slump
items.summary: Under-pressure George Skivington says he is enduring the hardest spell of his decade-long coaching career after Gloucester's miserable form continued with defeat away to Newcastle Red Bulls on Friday.

items.title: OnePlus Nord CE4 and CE4 Lite get Android 16
items.summary: OnePlus has been updating its smartphones to OxygenOS 16 based on Android 16 for quite a while now, and it's finally reached lower-midrange devices today. The update is now available for the Nord CE4 and the Nord CE4 Lite, which were both released in 2024. The Nord CE4 is seeing the rollout commencâ€¦

items.title: Masters snooker all you need to know and match schedule
items.summary: Match schedule, top seeds, prize money, former winners and BBC coverage details as the 2026 Masters gets under way at Alexandra Palace in London.

items.title: 'Nobody can get hold of him' - what happened to David Batty?
items.summary: England midfielder David Batty vowed to have "nothing to do with the football industry" after retirement. As his former clubs Newcastle and Leeds prepare to meet, BBC Sport asks: what happened to him?

items.title: Commentator Hartley struggles to understand 'stupid' Jacks dismissal
items.summary: Will Jacks' "stupidity" leads to a two-ball duck and frustration in the Test Match Special commentary box as the batter holes out to leave England on 219-5 on day four of the fifth Ashes Test in Sydney.

items.title: 'Absolutely brilliant!' - Bethell brings up maiden Test century in style
items.summary: Jacob Bethell smashes Beau Webster for four over deep mid-wicket to reach his first ever Test century, leaving England on 210-3 with a lead of 27 on day four of the fifth Ashes Test in Sydney.

items.title: Here's when the first iPhone with a 200MP camera is coming
items.summary: Back in May, Apple was rumored to be testing a 200MP camera for an upcoming iPhone, but unfortunately no other details were shared at that point. 200MP cameras are becoming very prevalent in the Android world, so it makes sense that Apple would want to experiment with the tech and see if it fits itâ€¦

items.title: OnePlus 16 Pro or 16 Ultra now rumored to be on the way
items.summary: Unlike basically all of its competitors, OnePlus decided to stay out of the Pro and Ultra branding game many years ago - for smartphones at least. Its flagships have just a number and no additional suffix, but according to a new rumor from a tipster over on X, that's about to change this year. Appaâ€¦

items.title: 'Magnificent innings' - Bethell makes first Test century
items.summary: Watch the best of Jacob Bethell as he makes his maiden first-class century on day four of the fifth Ashes Test in Sydney.

items.title: Motorola announces Razr 60 FIFA World Cup 26 Edition, AI Perceptive Companion, Moto Watch, and more
items.summary: At Lenovo Tech Day 2026 during CES, Motorola unveiled its first book-style foldable, the Razr Fold, alongside the new Motorola Signature. That wasnâ€™t all, though. Hereâ€™s a look at the other announcements from the event. Motorola unveiled the Razr 60 FIFA World Cup 26 Edition, a limited-edition modeâ€¦

items.title: Infinix unveils blade-less fan, liquid cooling, a gaming controller, and magnetic accessories
items.summary: Aside from the satellite communication support coming to the Note 60 series later this year, Infinix has also announced a new active cooling technology called HydroFlow. It's liquid cooling, "one of the smartphone world's most advanced", according to the brand. At the center of it all is the industâ€¦

items.title: Motorola Signature debuts with Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC, 50MP triple rear cameras
items.summary: Following the unveiling of the Razr Fold, Motorola also introduced the Signature, which is the first phone under the brandâ€™s new ultra-premium Signature series. The Motorola Signature features a 6.8-inch AMOLED display with a 165Hz refresh rate, Full HD+ resolution, up to 6,200 nits peak brightnessâ€¦

items.title: Lenovo's top ThinkPads and Yogas go all-in on Panther Lake â€” business laptops come with Windows and Linux options
items.summary: Lenovo is updating its high-end ThinkPad and Yoga laptops with Intel's Panther Lake Core Ultra processors at CES 2026.

items.title: Lenovo's CES concept devices include a rollable ultra-wide OLED Legion gaming laptop â€“ ThinkPad concept has an expandable screen that wraps around the outside of the lid
items.summary: Lenovo rolled out a pair of concept laptops at CES based around rollable, wrappable OLED screens. The Legion Pro Rollable is a gaming laptop that can go from wide to ultrawide, while the Rollable XD's extra screen height becomes a dynamic lid display when the front display isn't extended.

items.title: Lenovo brings handheld-favorite SteamOS to the flagship Legion Go 2 â€” the AMD Z2 Extreme gets official SteamOS support for the first time
items.summary: Lenovo is bringing official SteamOS support to AMDâ€™s Ryzen Z2 Extreme processor for the first time with an updated Legion Go 2.

items.title: Crawley trapped lbw in first over playing no shot
items.summary: Mitchell Starc strikes in the first over yet again as Zak Crawley is trapped lbw for one, having made no attempt at playing a shot, to leave England 4-1 on day four of the fifth Ashes Test in Sydney.

items.title: 'His day may be over' - Stokes leaves the field with groin injury
items.summary: Ben Stokes is forced off the field with a groin injury in the middle of his 28th over, on day four of the fifth Ashes Test in Sydney.

items.title: We had the mentality to get the job done - Dyche
items.summary: Nottingham Forest manager Sean Dyche was happy with the "grit and determination" his side showed to come from behind to beat relegation-threatened West Ham.

items.title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang says "the future is neural rendering" at CES 2026, teasing DLSS advancements â€” RTX 5090 could represent the pinnacle of traditional raster
items.summary: During a Q&A at CES 2025, Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang says that the future of graphics is neural rendering, and that the company is "working on things in the lab that are just utterly shocking and incredible."

items.title: West Ham relegation fight 'not over' - Nuno
items.summary: West Ham manager Nuno Espirito Santo reflects on his side's defeat by Nottingham Forest, insisting their relegation fight is "not over" with the Hammers seven points adrift of safety.

items.title: Late Gibbs-White penalty sinks helpless Hammers
items.summary: A late Morgan Gibbs-White penalty gave Nottingham Forest a crucial away victory over West Ham, leaving the London side seven points adrift of safety.

items.title: AMD hints at officially open-sourcing FSR 4 upscaling and frame generation technology in the wake of accidental release â€” accidental release may have forced the company's hand
items.summary: AMD hints at officially open-sourcing FSR 4

items.title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang says robots could be 'AI immigrants' that can address labor shortages â€” can 'do the type of work that maybe we decided not to do anymore'
items.summary: Jensen Huang, CEO of Nvidia, said that a wave of robots will serve as "AI immigrants" to drive the economy and do the jobs others don't want to do.

items.title: Micron announces 3610 SSD, the industry-first PCIe 5.0 QLC SSD available to OEMs â€” offers 4TB storage in a tiny single-sided M.2 2230 and 11,000 MB/s of performance
items.summary: Micron just announced the 3610 SSD, which is the first QLC chip to be offered in a compact single-sided M.2 2230 form factor.

items.title: Phison's new SSD controller sips a mere 2.3W and runs at 14.7 GB/s, addressing PCIe 5.0's power concerns â€” more affordable and power-saving PCIe 5.0 drives are coming for laptops and gaming handhelds
items.summary: Phison launches the new E37T PCIe 5.0 SSD controller at CES 2026, while also providing an update on the E38 controller with upcoming drives spanning up to 8TB.

items.title: AMD Ryzen chief teases return of older Zen 3 chips to fight soaring RAM prices â€” 'That's something we're actively working on right now'
items.summary: AMD interview suggests it might restart production of DDR4-based AM4 Ryzen desktop processors

items.title: 'A moving moment' as Rosenior breaks barriers
items.summary: Liam Rosenior's appointment as Chelsea manager is a "massive moment" for representation in the Premier League.

items.title: Community tests confirm DLSS 4.5 yields 20%+ performance loss on older RTX 30 and 20 series GPUs compared to DLSS 4.0 â€” Nvidia warnings ring true following rollout
items.summary: DLSS 4.5 testing by enthusiasts has revealed a 20% or greater performance reduction compared to DLSS 4.0 on RTX 20- and 30-series GPUs.

items.title: Corsair's Galleon 100 SD is an LED-lit keyboard with a built-in Stream Deck â€” $349 offering includes 720 x 180 screen, dials, and more
items.summary: Describing the Galleon in one sentence is simple: it's a near-full-sized keyboard, except the usual numeric pad is instead an Elgato Stream Deck.

items.title: Broadcom announces two dual-band Wi-Fi 8 chips â€” performance bifurcation introduced with Wi-Fi 7 lives on with the next gen
items.summary: Wi-Fi 8 will continue the wireless trend of the haves and the have-nots, with dual-band and tri-band products.

items.title: Asus unveils the ROG Cronox, its first panoramic PC case with a 9.2" screen and rotating fan bracket â€” chassis supports up to 14x 120mm fans & dual 360mm radiators
items.summary: Asus has just announced a brand new flagship PC case called the ROG Cronox, featuring a rotating screen and fan bracket that can be angled to your taste. The Cronox is made from aluminum and has tempered glass forming a panoramic design that meets at the edges with a subtle curve. It's a large caseâ€¦

items.title: Nvidia's focus on rack-scale AI systems is a portent for the year to come â€” Rubin points the way forward for company, as data center business booms
items.summary: Nvidia's CES keynote was notably not consumer-focused. Instead, the company detailed its booming data center business, with a deeper look at its NVL72 Rubin platform.

items.title: Asus' Zenbook lineup gets 2026 refresh â€”  ZenBook 14, Duo return with new AMD, Intel, and Snapdragon chips
items.summary: At CES 2026, Asus refreshes its tried and true Zenbook lineup with a swathe of new models, including the Zenbook lineup, with new S14, S16, A14, A16, and Zenbook Duo, sporting brand-new chips and upgrades.

items.title: Asus puts Strix Halo in the TUF Gaming A14 â€” strong integrated graphics in a very thin chassis
items.summary: Asus is packing AMD's latest Strix Halo processor into its thin and light TUF Gaming A14 laptops.

items.title: Asus teams up with HiFiMan for planar magnetic ROG Kithara gaming headset â€” extremely comfortable and excellent audio, for a price
items.summary: Asusâ€™ latest ROG Kithara wired headset sports customized, open-back HiFiMan planar magnetic drivers, a removable MEMS boom mic, and a balanced cable with swappable plugs.

items.title: Hands-on with Asusâ€™s ROG Falchion Ace 75 HE: Premium gaming, with an emphasis on physical adjustments and web-based configuration
items.summary: Asusâ€™s ROG Falchion Acer 75 HE checks all the boxes for a premium gaming keyboard in 2026, including magnetic switches, 8K polling, Rapid Trigger, a web-based utility, and, of course, RGB. Its stand-out feature is a tactile rocker wheel that lets you fine-tune the switches on the fly.

items.title: 'It's a key moment that celebrates a young, black English manager'
items.summary: Kick It Out CEO Samuel Okafor and ex-Chelsea defender Paul Elliott, former chair of the FA's inclusion and diversity board, talk to BBC Sport about the importance of appointing Liam Rosenior as Chelsea manager.

items.title: Raspberry Pi and mini PC home lab prices hit parity as DRAM costs skyrocket â€” price hikes force hobbyists to weigh up performance versus power consumption
items.summary: The price of a Raspberry Pi now has parity with Intel N100 mini PCs at just over $200, with flash memory price spikes continuing to push prices up across the board.

items.title: Rosenior 'ready' for Chelsea job
items.summary: Speaking in his last press conference as Strasbourg manager, Liam Rosenior says taking the job at Chelsea is the right move for his career. The 41-year-old has spent the last 18-months at the Blues' sister club Strasbourg after he was sacked from Hull City in 2024.

items.title: Chinaâ€™s GPU cloud consolidates around Baidu and Huawei as domestic AI chips scale up â€” export controls leave gap open for homegrown solutions
items.summary: Chinaâ€™s GPU cloud market is consolidating rapidly around a small number of domestic champions, with Baidu and Huawei emerging as the clear leaders, as access to Nvidiaâ€™s most advanced accelerators remains restricted.

items.title: CES 2026 Day 0: Nvidia debuts DLSS 4.5, Ryzen 7 9850X3D aims for desktop gaming glory, Intel Panther Lake arrives
items.summary: CES 2026 is off to a fast start, with a flurry of announcements coming in from your favorite tech companies

items.title: In Pictures: Sporting photos of the week
items.summary: A selection of some of the most striking sports photographs taken around the world over the past seven days.

items.title: AMD unwraps Instinct MI500 boasting 1,000X more performance versus MI300X â€” setting the stage for the era of YottaFLOPS data centers
items.summary: AMD announces CDNA 6-based Instinct MI500-series GPUs with HBM4E memory set to arrive in 2027 and offer 1000X higher performance compared to Instinct MI300X.

items.title: Commodore 64 floppy drive has the power to be a computer â€” bulky 1982 Commodore 1541 5.25 inch drive packs a 1 MHz MOS 6502 CPU
items.summary: TechTuber shows that the Commodore 1541 floppy disk electronics were powerful and capable enough to work as a standalone computer.

items.title: Gigabyte's Aorus RTX 5090 Infinity takes aim at Asus' ROG Matrix â€” superconducting heatpipes, 'Windforce Hyperburst' cooling brings 'penetrating airflow' to both sides of the card
items.summary: Gigabyteâ€™s latest Aorus flagship GPU combines a double flow-through design, advanced thermal materials, and a reduced footprint.

items.title: Amorim 'blow-up' brings Wilcox into the spotlight
items.summary: Who is Manchester United's director of football Jason Wilcox and how did he become one of the most powerful figures in football?
